official.headline: Halden Echoes Circulate
official.anchor_line: Audio and written messages, allegedly from late administrator Halden, are circulating on public channels.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizens are encouraged to treat all digital communications responsibly, as advanced governance promotes clarity and collective order.

official.headline: Public Discourse Rises
official.anchor_line: City forums and official panels welcome questions about the Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI.
official.contextual_reframing: Open dialogue builds trust and demonstrates the system's adaptability for a harmonious society.

official.headline: BCI Explained
official.anchor_line: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, uses real-time data to ensure smooth access to services based on positive city participation.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparency and cooperation keep Stenograd efficient and secure, reinforcing shared civic values.

underground.headline: Halden’s Ghost Stirs
underground.anchor_line: Mysterious Halden Echoes jam the channels—nobody believes they’re just harmless static.
underground.contextual_reframing: A dead engineer speaks more truth than the Council. Watch how the system fidgets when real questions echo through the grid.

underground.headline: Scores Rule Everything
underground.anchor_line: BCI—Behavioral Compliance Index—still blocks your rights, no matter the propaganda about ‘smooth access’.
underground.contextual_reframing: If your score drops, you disappear. This ‘neutral’ math is the leash on every citizen’s life—dressed up as safety.

underground.headline: Rumors Or Reality?
underground.anchor_line: Underground briefings claim Council factions are at war over the Halden leaks—so much for stable governance.
underground.contextual_reframing: Newsflash: When the BCI stutters, the people finally see the cracks. The fight isn’t just in secret rooms—it’s under every camera and behind every form you fill out.
